main event: A stationary light in the sky zigzagged to the northeast and disappeared from view after 30 minutes of observation.
interesting points: The object appeared as a stationary light in the sky for 30 minutes.
The object then moved in a zigzag pattern to the northeast and disappeared from view.
The report mentions wind conditions at different altitudes.
The object is described as a disc-shaped object the size of a grapefruit, with a yellowish-gold color and star-like brightness.
The object moved steadily to the south or southeast at an altitude of 45,000 feet before disappearing from view.
sighted object: a disc-shaped object with a yellowish-gold color and star-like brightness
